name: remainer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who voted for the United Kingdom to remain in the European Union in the 2016 referendum (= a vote in which all the people in a country are asked to decide an important political or social question ): She said that Brexit would happen and remainers would be forced to accept it.
